ua.shevchuk.testing

Class TestingRequestWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ua.shevchuk.testing.TestingRequestWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RequestWrapper

    public class TestingRequestWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements RequestWrapper
    This class provides an implementation of the RequestWrapper interface, and works without an instance of HttpServletRequest wrapped class for testing purposes.
